channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13144] HS2 can leak ZK ACL objects when curator retries to create the persistent ephemeral node
item.description: When the node gets deleted from ZK due to connection loss and curator tries to recreate the node, it might leak ZK ACL.
item.summary: HS2 can leak ZK ACL objects when curator retries to create the persistent ephemeral node

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: thejas up for review whenever you have time.
